patthana8.51:4.1: Nasaṃkiliṭṭhaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nasaṃkiliṭṭho dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. #1
patthana8.51:5.1: Naasaṃkiliṭṭhaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca naasaṃkiliṭṭho dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana8.51:5.2: Naasaṃkiliṭṭhaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nasaṃkiliṭṭho dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana8.51:5.3: Naasaṃkiliṭṭhaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nasaṃkiliṭṭho ca naasaṃkiliṭṭho ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā. #3
patthana8.51:6.1: Nasaṃkiliṭṭhañca naasaṃkiliṭṭhañca dhammaṃ paṭicca nasaṃkiliṭṭho dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana8.51:7.1: Hetuyā pañca, ārammaṇe dve … pe … vipāke ekaṃ … pe … avigate pañca.
